title: Couple With Heart Person Man Light Skin Tone Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with a heart symbol between them. The skin tones are specified as light for the person and medium for the man. This emoji signifies love, romance, partnership, and affection.
apple_vendor_description: Rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, this couple with a heart emoji on Apple devices features a man with a light skin tone and another with a medium skin tone, enveloped by a vibrant, heart-shaped glow. The soft rounded edges of the figures and the luminous quality of the heart emphasize tenderness and deep affection.
